subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell said in his annual state of the league news conference that he was optimistic of reaching a new labor agreement with the players before the 2010 season.
snippet: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell said in his annual state of the league news conference that he was optimistic of reaching a new labor agreement with the players before the 2010 season.
